verses.verse: And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Mosheh <WH4872> in the plains <WH6160> of Moab <WH4124> by Yarden <WH3383> near Yericho <WH3405>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Command <WH6680> <WH8761> the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, that they give <WH5414> <WH8804> unto the L'vi'im <WH3881> of the inheritance <WH5159> of their possession <WH272> cities <WH5892> to dwell in <WH3427> <WH8800>; and ye shall give <WH5414> <WH8799> also unto the L'vi'im <WH3881> suburbs <WH4054> for the cities <WH5892> round about <WH5439> them.

And the cities <WH5892> shall they have to dwell in <WH3427> <WH8800>; and the suburbs <WH4054> of them shall be for their cattle <WH929>, and for their goods <WH7399>, and for all their beasts <WH2416>.

And the suburbs <WH4054> of the cities <WH5892>, which ye shall give <WH5414> <WH8799> unto the L'vi'im <WH3881>, shall reach from the wall <WH7023> of the city <WH5892> and outward <WH2351> a thousand <WH505> cubits <WH520> round about <WH5439>.

And ye shall measure <WH4058> <WH8804> from without <WH2351> the city <WH5892> on the east <WH6924> side <WH6285> two thousand <WH505> cubits <WH520>, and on the south <WH5045> side <WH6285> two thousand <WH505> cubits <WH520>, and on the west <WH3220> side <WH6285> two thousand <WH505> cubits <WH520>, and on the north <WH6828> side <WH6285> two thousand <WH505> cubits <WH520>; and the city <WH5892> shall be in the midst <WH8432>: this shall be to them the suburbs <WH4054> of the cities <WH5892>.

And among the cities <WH5892> which ye shall give <WH5414> <WH8799> unto the L'vi'im <WH3881> there shall be six <WH8337> cities <WH5892> for refuge <WH4733>, which ye shall appoint <WH5414> <WH8799> for the manslayer <WH7523> <WH8802>, that he may flee <WH5127> <WH8800> thither: and to them ye shall add <WH5414> <WH8799> forty <WH705> and two <WH8147> cities <WH5892>.
So all the cities <WH5892> which ye shall give <WH5414> <WH8799> to the L'vi'im <WH3881> shall be forty <WH705> and eight <WH8083> cities <WH5892>: them shall ye give with their suburbs <WH4054>.

And the cities <WH5892> which ye shall give <WH5414> <WH8799> shall be of the possession <WH272> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>: from them that have many <WH7227> ye shall give many <WH7235> <WH8686>; but from them that have few <WH4592> ye shall give few <WH4591> <WH8686>: every one <WH376> shall give <WH5414> <WH8799> of his cities <WH5892> unto the L'vi'im <WH3881> according <WH6310> to his inheritance <WH5159> which he inheriteth <WH5157> <WH8799>.
And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Speak <WH1696> <WH8761> unto the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and say <WH559> <WH8804> unto them, When ye be come over <WH5674> <WH8802> Yarden <WH3383> into the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3667>;

Then ye shall appoint <WH7136> <WH8689> you cities <WH5892> to be cities <WH5892> of refuge <WH4733> for you; that the slayer <WH7523> <WH8802> may flee <WH5127> <WH8804> thither, which killeth <WH5221> <WH8688> any person <WH5315> at unawares <WH7684>.

And they shall be unto you cities <WH5892> for refuge <WH4733> from the avenger <WH1350> <WH8802>; that the manslayer <WH7523> <WH8802> die <WH4191> <WH8799> not, until he stand <WH5975> <WH8800> before <WH6440> the congregation <WH5712> in judgment <WH4941>.
And of these cities <WH5892> which ye shall give <WH5414> <WH8799> six <WH8337> cities <WH5892> shall ye have for refuge <WH4733>.

Ye shall give <WH5414> <WH8799> three <WH7969> cities <WH5892> on this side <WH5676> Yarden <WH3383>, and three <WH7969> cities <WH5892> shall ye give <WH5414> <WH8799> in the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3667>, which shall be cities <WH5892> of refuge <WH4733>.

These six <WH8337> cities <WH5892> shall be a refuge <WH4733>, both for the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and for the stranger <WH1616>, and for the sojourner <WH8453> among <WH8432> them: that every one that killeth <WH5221> <WH8688> any person <WH5315> unawares <WH7684> may flee <WH5127> <WH8800> thither.

And if he smite <WH5221> <WH8689> him with an instrument <WH3627> of iron <WH1270>, so that he die <WH4191> <WH8799>, he is a murderer <WH7523> <WH8802>: the murderer <WH7523> <WH8802> shall surely <WH4191> <WH8800> be put to death <WH4191> <WH8714>.

And if he smite <WH5221> <WH8689> him with throwing <WH3027> a stone <WH68>, wherewith he may die <WH4191> <WH8799>, and he die <WH4191> <WH8799>, he is a murderer <WH7523> <WH8802>: the murderer <WH7523> <WH8802> shall surely <WH4191> <WH8800> be put to death <WH4191> <WH8714>.

Or if he smite <WH5221> <WH8689> him with an hand <WH3027> weapon <WH3627> of wood <WH6086>, wherewith he may die <WH4191> <WH8799>, and he die <WH4191> <WH8799>, he is a murderer <WH7523> <WH8802>: the murderer <WH7523> <WH8802> shall surely <WH4191> <WH8800> be put to death <WH4191> <WH8714>.

The revenger <WH1350> <WH8802> of blood <WH1818> himself shall slay <WH4191> <WH8686> the murderer <WH7523> <WH8802>: when he meeteth <WH6293> <WH8800> him, he <WH1931> shall slay <WH4191> <WH8686> him.
But if he thrust <WH1920> <WH8799> him of hatred <WH8135>, or hurl <WH7993> <WH8689> at him by laying of wait <WH6660>, that he die <WH4191> <WH8799>;

Or in enmity <WH342> smite <WH5221> <WH8689> him with his hand <WH3027>, that he die <WH4191> <WH8799>: he that smote <WH5221> <WH8688> him shall surely <WH4191> <WH8800> be put to death <WH4191> <WH8714>; for he is a murderer <WH7523> <WH8802>: the revenger <WH1350> <WH8802> of blood <WH1818> shall slay <WH4191> <WH8686> the murderer <WH7523> <WH8802>, when he meeteth <WH6293> <WH8800> him.
But if he thrust <WH1920> <WH8804> him suddenly <WH6621> without <WH3808> enmity <WH342>, or have cast <WH7993> <WH8689> upon him any thing <WH3627> without laying of wait <WH6660>,

Or with any stone <WH68>, wherewith a man may die <WH4191> <WH8799>, seeing <WH7200> <WH8800> him not <WH3808>, and cast <WH5307> <WH8686> it upon him, that he die <WH4191> <WH8799>, and was not his enemy <WH341> <WH8802>, neither sought <WH1245> <WH8764> his harm <WH7451>:
Then the congregation <WH5712> shall judge <WH8199> <WH8804> between the slayer <WH5221> <WH8688> and the revenger <WH1350> <WH8802> of blood <WH1818> according to these judgments <WH4941>:

And the congregation <WH5712> shall deliver <WH5337> <WH8689> the slayer <WH7523> <WH8802> out of the hand <WH3027> of the revenger <WH1350> <WH8802> of blood <WH1818>, and the congregation <WH5712> shall restore <WH7725> <WH8689> him to the city <WH5892> of his refuge <WH4733>, whither he was fled <WH5127> <WH8804>: and he shall abide <WH3427> <WH8804> in it unto the death <WH4194> of the high <WH1419> Kohen <WH3548>, which was anointed <WH4886> <WH8804> with the holy <WH6944> oil <WH8081>.

But if the slayer <WH7523> <WH8802> shall at any time <WH3318> <WH8800> come <WH3318> <WH8799> without the border <WH1366> of the city <WH5892> of his refuge <WH4733>, whither he was fled <WH5127> <WH8799>;

And the revenger <WH1350> <WH8802> of blood <WH1818> find <WH4672> <WH8804> him without <WH2351> the borders <WH1366> of the city <WH5892> of his refuge <WH4733>, and the revenger <WH1350> <WH8802> of blood <WH1818> kill <WH7523> <WH8804> the slayer <WH7523> <WH8802>; he shall not be guilty of blood <WH1818>:

Because he should have remained <WH3427> <WH8799> in the city <WH5892> of his refuge <WH4733> until the death <WH4194> of the high <WH1419> Kohen <WH3548>: but after <WH310> the death <WH4194> of the high <WH1419> Kohen <WH3548> the slayer <WH7523> <WH8802> shall return <WH7725> <WH8799> into the land <WH776> of his possession <WH272>.
So these things shall be for a statute <WH2708> of judgment <WH4941> unto you throughout your generations <WH1755> in all your dwellings <WH4186>.

Whoso killeth <WH5221> <WH8688> any person <WH5315>, the murderer <WH7523> <WH8802> shall be put to death <WH7523> <WH8799> by the mouth <WH6310> of witnesses <WH5707>: but one <WH259> witness <WH5707> shall not testify <WH6030> <WH8799> against any person <WH5315> to cause him to die <WH4191> <WH8800>.

Moreover ye shall take <WH3947> <WH8799> no satisfaction <WH3724> for the life <WH5315> of a murderer <WH7523> <WH8802>, which is guilty <WH7563> of death <WH4191> <WH8800>: but he shall be surely <WH4191> <WH8800> put to death <WH4191> <WH8714>.

And ye shall take <WH3947> <WH8799> no satisfaction <WH3724> for him that is fled <WH5127> <WH8800> to the city <WH5892> of his refuge <WH4733>, that he should come again <WH7725> <WH8800> to dwell <WH3427> <WH8800> in the land <WH776>, until the death <WH4194> of the Kohen <WH3548>.

So ye shall not pollute <WH2610> <WH8686> the land <WH776> wherein ye are: for blood <WH1818> it defileth <WH2610> <WH8686> the land <WH776>: and the land <WH776> cannot be cleansed <WH3722> <WH8792> of the blood <WH1818> that is shed <WH8210> <WH8795> therein, but by the blood <WH1818> of him that shed <WH8210> <WH8802> it.

Defile <WH2930> <WH8762> not therefore the land <WH776> which ye shall inhabit <WH3427> <WH8802>, wherein <WH8432> I dwell <WH7931> <WH8802>: for I the YY <WH3068> dwell <WH7931> <WH8802> among <WH8432> the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.
